languages.text: "Прошу прощения, это никак невозможно. Частная собственность. Разрешенная законом деятельность. Лицензия от Наместника. Благородная цель, в конце концов — привитие гражданам Футфола должного отношения к врагам {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}". {n}Молодой человек виновато разводит руками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Прошу прощения, это никак невозможно. Частная собственность. Разрешенная законом деятельность. Лицензия от Наместника. Благородная цель, в конце концов — привитие у граждан Футфола должного отношения к врагам Империума". {n}Молодой человек виновато разводит руками.{/n}

languages.text: "Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, это никак невозможно. Частная собственность. Разрешенная законом деятельность. Лицензия от Наместника. Благородная цель, в конце концов — привитие гражданам Футфола должного отношения к врагам {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}". {n}Молодой человек виновато разводит руками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to be helping the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the Imperium." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to be helping the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the Imperium." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the Imperium." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the Imperium." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

"Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

languages.text: 「{mf|旦那|ご婦人}、それは無理だね。これは個人の所有物だ。領主から許可を得た正当なビジネスなんだよ。それに、これにゃあ崇高な目的がある。フットフォールの住民に、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵とはどういう奴らかをしっかり教育してるんだ」{n}彼は申し訳なさそうな表情を浮かべながら、自分にはどうしようもできないのだと言いたげな素振りを見せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|旦那|ご婦人}、それは無理だね。これは個人の所有物だ。領主から許可を得た正当なビジネスなんだよ。それに、これにゃあ崇高な目的がある。フットフォールの住民に、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵とはどういう奴らかをしっかり教育してるんだ」{n}彼は申し訳なさそうな表情を浮かべながら、自分にはどうしようもできないのだと言いたげな素振りを見せた。{/n}

languages.text: “抱歉，{mf|先生|女士}，这可不行。这些都是私人财产，是合法生意，得到了总督的授权。还有，不得不提的是，这是一项崇高的事业，可以帮助落脚港的公民培养对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}之敌的正确态度。”{n}他带着愧疚的神情，作了个无可奈何的手势。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “抱歉，{mf|先生|女士}，这可不行。这些都是私人财产，是合法生意，得到了总督的授权。还有，不得不提的是，这是一项崇高的事业，可以帮助落脚港的公民培养对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}之敌的正确态度。”{n}他带着愧疚的神情，作了个无可奈何的手势。{/n}

languages.text: «Lo lamento, {mf|caballero|señora}, pero es imposible. Propiedad privada. Actividad lícita, con el permiso del Señor. Por último y no por ello menos importante, se trata de una causa noble: enseñar a los ciudadanos de Paso a actuar ante los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}». {n}Con una expresión culpable, hace un gesto de impotencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo lamento, {mf|caballero|señora}, pero es imposible. Propiedad privada. Actividad lícita, con el permiso del Señor. Por último y no por ello menos importante, se trata de una causa noble: enseñar a los ciudadanos de Paso a actuar ante los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}». {n}Con una expresión culpable, hace un gesto de impotencia.{/n}

languages.text: « Je vous prie de m'excuser, noble {mf|sire|dame}, mais c'est tout simplement impossible. Il s'agit d'une propriété privée et d'une affaire légitime, approuvée par le suzerain. De plus, cette entreprise sert une noble cause : nous aidons les citoyens de Castel à reconnaître les ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} et à adopter la bonne attitude face à eux. » {n}Il vous adresse un regard coupable et écarte les mains, impuissant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie de m'excuser, noble {mf|sire|dame}, mais c'est tout simplement impossible. Il s'agit d'une propriété privée et d'une affaire légitime, approuvée par le suzerain. De plus, cette entreprise sert une noble cause : nous aidons les citoyens de Castel à reconnaître les ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} et à adopter la bonne attitude face à eux. » {n}Il vous adresse un regard coupable et écarte les mains, impuissant.{/n}

languages.text: " Verzeiht, {mf|Sir|Madam}, das ist schlichtweg unmöglich. Privatbesitz. Angemeldetes Gewerbe. Mit Lizenz des Lehnsherren. Und schließlich ist es eine edle Sache – wir helfen den Bürgern von Footfall, die richtige Einstellung gegenüber den Feinden des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu entwickeln." {n}Mit schuldbewusstem Blick macht er eine Geste der Hilflosigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: " Verzeiht, {mf|Sir|Madam}, das ist schlichtweg unmöglich. Privatbesitz. Angemeldetes Gewerbe. Mit Lizenz des Lehnsherren. Und schließlich ist es eine edle Sache – wir helfen den Bürgern von Footfall, die richtige Einstellung gegenüber den Feinden des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu entwickeln." {n}Mit schuldbewusstem Blick macht er eine Geste der Hilflosigkeit.{/n}

languages.text: "Özür dilerim {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi} ama mümkün değil. Mülk özel, işletme de yasal. Ruhsat bizzat Emîr tarafından verildi. Hepsinden öte, iyi bir amaca hizmet ediyor. Binliman yurttaşlarına {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} düşmanlarına karşı doğru tutumun ne olduğunu aşılıyor." {n}Suçlu bir yüz ifadesiyle, elimden bir şey gelmez dercesine kollarını açıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Apologies, {mf|sir|ma'am}, that is simply impossible. Private property. Legitimate business. Licensed by the Liege. Last but not least, it's a noble cause — to help the citizens of Footfall foster a proper attitude toward enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}." {n}With a guilty look, he makes a helpless gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Özür dilerim {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi} ama bu mümkün değil. Şahsi bir mülk. Yasal bir işletme. Ruhsat bizzat Emîr tarafından sağlandı. Hepsinden öte, iyi bir amaca hizmet ediyor, Binliman vatandaşlarının {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un düşmanlarının görünüşüne âşina olmalarını sağlıyor." {n}Suçlu bir yüz ifadesiyle çaresiz bir görüntü sergiliyor.{/n}
